title: Reporting From The Site Of The Ebola Outbreak's Origin
teaser: The first wave of the Ebola virus struck Liberia's northern Lofa County back in March. Correspondent Ofeibea Quist-Arcton traveled to Lofa, and speaks to NPR's Scott Simon about the current situation.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
